title: Forever Rain
description: Zoe Caine is no longer a twenty-year old nursing student. As a successful business woman and owner of Bluebonnet Nursing Agency in Houston Texas, she is know for being hard working, fair and reputable. Over the past ten years Zoe has built a comfortable life for herself while putting the memories of Jordan Dawson in the recess of her mind. Ten years is a long time to wait but the commercial real estate giant Jordan Dawson has done just that and he is not willing to wait a day longer to win back the heart of Zoe Caine. He has set up house at her front door and has no intentions of leaving. Jordan has a well laid out plan for Zoe and all is falling into place but will their past come back and break them apart again? Will Zoe give up on what they could have and lead a life where there will be forever rain?
author: Cindy Lou Moldovan
